data.title: Cheap Flights & All Inclusive Vacations from Vancouver
data.meta_description: Vancouver's travel deal community.  Find cheap flights, holiday packages, and all inclusive vacations from YVR.  Featuring articles, guides, alerts, forums, discount promo codes, sales and more.
data.text:
2024

27

August

Seattle to Papeete, Tahiti - $715 CAD roundtrip including taxes

United Airlines has dropped the price of their flights from Seattle to Papeete, Tahiti down to $715 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have 1 stop each way in San Francisco.

Carry-on and a checked bag are included.

Worth the drive?

For comparison, the cheapest flights from Vancouver to Tahiti throughout 2024/2025 are currently $1610 CAD roundtrip.

Should I stay in Papeete? Are accommodations reasonable in Tahiti?

Papeete is on Tahiti Island, which contains the airport everyone uses to get to Tahiti. Papeete is just the busy capital and Tahiti Island itself is not generally what people are picturing when they think of Tahiti.

What you want to do is hop on a ferry over to Mo'orea Island. Mo'orea is about 30 minutes away, and drop dead gorgeous.

You can usually find somewhere reasonably priced to stay on Mo'orea. On Airbnb you can find highly rated places in the high $100s to low $200s CAD per night. Here's a search you can start with.

Here's a link to my map of Mo'orea from a trip a few years back. It contains things to do, see, where the best hikes, beaches and snorkel spots are, etc.

Availability for travel

Late October, November, first half of December 2024

January, February 2025

How to find and book this deal

1. Start with the following Google Flights search:

Google Flights: Seattle to Papeete, Tahiti

- Click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view.

- Browse for the cheapest dates by adjusting the trip length at the bottom.

- Look for the dates that are $725 roundtrip

2. Go to FlightHub or Skyscanner

3. Search for a flight from Vancouver (YVR) to Papeete, Tahiti (PPT)

- Try the same dates you found on Google Flights.

screenshot from FlightHub

Sign up for YVR Deals Alerts from Vancouver

Go to the Alerts Page to sign up for flight deal alerts by e-mail, Facebook, or Twitter.

Travellers from Vancouver also often sign up for alerts from Calgary and Toronto.

Join us in the YVR Deals Facebook Group

For live discussion of this deal, or to get some amazing travel advice (about anywhere) from your 107,000 fellow passengers in Vancouver, join us in the

YVR Deals Facebook Group.

^^^ click the 'Join Group' button when you arrive.

Hit Like if you like this deal! Click Share to show your friends on Facebook.
